markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 14+"
    pfs=""
>
[Skyrider Sword](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1432)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Air" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=5" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 106</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Greatsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=24)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [shock](/Equipment.aspx?ID=303) [greatsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=24)_ has a broad, flat blade that can support the weight of a Medium-sized or smaller wielder. Magic allows the weapon to soar through the air, carrying its wielder along with it.

<document level="2" id="action-1079" />

<document level="2" id="action-1080" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 14"
pfs="Standard"
>
Skyrider Sword
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 106</row>

**Price** 4,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 1

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 19"
pfs="Standard"
>
Skyrider Sword (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 106</row>

**Price** 32,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 1

</row>

</column>

**Craft Requirements** The sword is a _+3 greater striking greater shock greatsword_. You can activate the weapon's flight any number of times per day, and its duration is no longer limited to 10 minutes.
name: Skyrider Sword (Greater)
